author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(make_dir_baton): Comment and correct the various ways in which we
can calculate the URL for a switched directory in light of
anchors, targets, parents, the alignment of the planets, and the
dollar-to-peso exchange rate.  This is supposed to fix some 'svn
switch' commands.

author: julianfoad
msg: Remove "const" where it was over-zealously used on some function parameters
that are passed by value.  It has no meaning in the interface, and only
exposes an artifact of the current implementation.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(close_directory): Funny how actually to-doing the things you leave
notes "todo" can actually improve the behavior of your software.
Fix 'svn st -uv dir-scheduled-for-addition' so that it shows the
to-be-added children of the dir, too, like just -v does.  Thanks
to Julian Foad for noticing the inconsistency.

author: julianfoad
msg: Regression test for issue #1532: "Switch a file to a dir:
can't switch it back to the file"; initially as XFAIL.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/switch_tests.py
(file_dir_file): New test.
(test_list): Add the new test as XFAIL.

author: julianfoad
msg: Expand and correct the help for "svn list".
* doc/book/book/ch08.xml
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c (svn_cl__cmd_table)
Re-write the entry for "svn list".
